column3: ao EWURADZE
na m'akoban na me gyefo; Me Nyankopɔn
column5: ɔwo wo mu na muguan kosuma

column3: ɔno a ɔsɛ dɛ woyi no ayɛw no: Na ɔgye me fi m'atamfo nsamu."
Na ɔsɛɛ praam mo do dɛ nsu n'awor dzendzen."

column2: "Samanadze nkyehoma brabraa mo ho: Owu ne mfir baa mo do."

column3: Me Nyankopɔn na musui frɛɛ no: Ofi n'asɔrfi mu tsee me ndze
column4: Na mo su wɔ n'enyim kodur n'asomu."

column3: Mbepɔw fapem so tutui
Na ogya dzɛwee fi n'anomu puei: Ogyansenama a ɔdzɛw a."
na odwirii; Nna sum kebii dzi n'ananadze."
na otui: Nyew
n'asesee a etwa no ho ehyia
Na ɔsor abo na ogyansenama puei fii no mununkum kebii no mu bae."
Na Ɔsorsornyi no paapaa ne ndze mu: Ɔsor abo na ogyansenama."
na ɔbɔɔ hɔn petsee
Na wiadze mfapem ho dedaa hɔ
column6: Wɔ w'ahwentokura mu ehuhuw huuhuw no ntsi."

column2: "Ɔtseen ne nsa fi sor bɛfaa me; Ɔtwee me fii nsubansuba pii mu."
"Ɔgyee me fii me tamfo ɔhoɔdzenfo no hɔ
column3: Na hɔn a wokyir me no
column4: osiandɛ nna wɔyɛ dzen dodow ma me."

column2: "Wɔbɔtoatoaa me wɔ m'amandzehu da no mu: Na EWURADZE yɛɛ me kyirtaafo."
"Ɔdze me fiir edzi so baa beebi a ɔtsew; Ɔgyee me
column3: osiandɛ n'enyi gyee mo ho."

column2: "EWURADZE tuaa me kaw dɛ mbrɛ me ndzeyɛtsenenee tse; Dɛ mbrɛ me nsa ho tsew pa no na oetua me ho kaw."

column3: Na mimmfii me Nyankopɔn nkyɛn emumuyɛ mu mmfirii."
Na mennyi n'ahyɛdze emmfi me nkyɛn annkyen."
Na misiee moho fii emumuyɛ ho."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi na EWURADZE ahyɛ me ananmu dɛ mbrɛ me ndzeyɛtsenenee tse; Dɛ mbrɛ me nsa ho tsew pa wɔ n'enyi do."
"Ɔnokwafo no na ɔwo enye no bedzi no nokwar mu; Nyia odzi mu na ɔwo enye no bedzi no emudzi mu."
"Nyia no ho tsew na ɔwo ebɛtsew woho akyerɛ no
column3: Na nyia ɔyɛ kɔntɔnkye na ɔwo ebɛkyea woho akyerɛ no."

column2: "Na ɔwo ebɛgye ɔman ahobrɛadzefo nkwa; Na enyiwa a ɔtra ntɔn dze ɔwo ebɛberɛ no adze."

column3: ɔwo na ebɔsɔ me kandzea: EWURADZE me Nyankopɔn bɛtsew mo sum mu."
ɔwo na medze wo tu mbirika fa asafo dɔm do; Na me Nyankopɔn na medze no huruw tra atamfo fasu."
no kwan tsen: Na EWURADZE n'anohoba yɛ nokwar; Ɔyɛ kyɛm dze ma hɔn a woguan kosuma no mu nyinara."
gyedɛ hɛn EWURADZE nko? Na woana yɛ ɔbotan

column2: "Nyankopɔn a ɔdze ahoɔdzen bɔ mo do
column3: Na ɔma mo kwan dzi mu."

column2: "Ɔyɛ m'anan dɛ ntrɔmaber anan: Na ɔdze me si me mbea sorɔnsorɔm do."
"Ɔkyerɛkyerɛ me nsa akodzi; Ma m'abasa tum pon kɔɔber egyen."

column3: ɔwo edze wo nkwagye kyɛm no so ama me: Na wo nsa enyimfa esuo mo mu
column4: Na wo mboa maa meyɛɛ ɔkɛse."

column3: Na m'anan nntserewee."
na mato hɔn: Nkyii so merennsan dze ekodu dɛ woewie sa."

column2: "Mobɔbobɔ hɔn ehwiramu ma wonnkotum asoɛr: Wɔbɔtotɔ wɔ m'ananadze."
"Na ɔwo na edze ahoɔdzen abɔ me do ama akodzi no: Ɔwo abrɛ hɔn a wɔsoɛree tsiaa me no adze ahyɛ m'ase."
"Ɔwo na ama m'atamfo so adan hɔn ekyir ama me
column3: Ama maasɛɛ hɔn a wokyir me."
na obi nnyi hɔ a ɔgye hɔn: Wɔfrɛɛ EWURADZE mpo

column2: "Nna meyaam hɔn huntuhuntu dɛ mframa enyim tutuw: Motoow hɔn gu dɛ abrɔn mu dɛtse."
"Ɔwo eyi me efi ɔman aperdzi mu; Ɔwo ayɛ me amanaman do etsitsir: Ɔman a minnyim hɔn mpo na wɔsoom me."
"Wɔtsee me nka ara na wobetsiee me: Ananaben brɛɛ hɔnho adze maa me."

column3: Na wɔdze ahopopo fi sumabea bae."

column2: "EWURADZE tse ase; na nhyira nka mo botantsim no; Na abɔso nye mo nkwagye Nyankopɔn;"
"Mekyerɛ Nyankopɔn a odzi wer ma me
column3: Na ɔbrɛ aman adze hyɛ m'ase no."

column2: "Ɔno na oyi me fi m'atamfo mu: Nyew
column3: ɔwo na ema me do bɔ hɔn a wɔsoɛr tsia me do: Ɔwo na iyi me fi nyimpa kakaben ne nsamu."
EWURADZE
column4: mebɛda wo ase wɔ amanaman mu
column5: Na matow ayɛyindwom ama wo dzin."

column2: "Nkwagye kɛse na ɔdze ma ne hen; Na ɔyɛ adɔyɛ ma ne nyia wɔasera no no
column3: Ɔdze ma David na n'asefo afebɔɔ."
